name: 張正春
objective:
本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)FIR數位濾波器設計 (4)IIR數位濾波器設計 (5)適應性訊號處理介紹 (6)工程應用及實例研討。

This course introduces the basic theory of digital signal processing and its application. The course outline includes: (1) Discrete-time Fourier transform and fast Fourier transform (2) Z-transform and its application (3) FIR digital filter design (4) IIR digital filter design (5) Adaptive signal processing (6) Practical applications.
